subject: Automobile Racing
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A longtime racing fan, Gene Monahan envisioned a different life after his 49 years with the Yankees. He is now the trainer for the Hendrick Motorsports pit crew members.
snippet: A longtime racing fan, Gene Monahan envisioned a different life after his 49 years with the Yankees. He is now the trainer for the Hendrick Motorsports pit crew members.
